title: Connect to the Internet with Wi-Fi
answer:
1. On the home screen, click Settings > Wi-Fi. 

 2. If the Wi-Fi switch is turned off, drag the button to turn it on; 

 3. If it is turned on, the phone will automatically scan for available hotspots nearby. Click the hotspots to be connected, enter the correct password in the dialog box that appears, click Connect; after a successful connection to the hotspots, you can access the Internet via Wi-Fi.
